author: tellison
msg: Fix for HARMONY-207 (make/build-java.xml should have basedir consistent with other make/*.xml files)

author: josias
msg: modified lucene index configuration: now the indexes are configured in the file pubid/config/lucene_index.xconf. this is not an xpatch file, i.e. the configuration will not go to cocoon.xconf. this allows to create new indexes at runtime.
